Acaia Updater BLE is not supported
Step. 1 Instruction Guide Step. 2 Select Scale Weight 0.0.g 選擇固件版本 Step. 3 Switch Update Mode Start Firmware Update None Done Progress 0.0% Downloading Firmware... Download Firmware Failed Need to download latest firmware.
1.Check Firmware Version 2.Switch scale to update mode 3.Connect the scale with APP 4.Start Firmware Update 5.Trouble Shooting
Power button T button 1. Press and hold Power button while turning on the scale. When the LED display shows nAcaia and then SEt , release the Power button.f 2. For version 2.5 it shows - 2.5 -
Power button T button 1. Press and hold Power button while turning on the scale. When the LED display shows nAcaia and then SEt , press and hold T button for another 1 second without releasing the power button When the LED display shows F .0000 ,release both keys. 2. Input the password with T button 2.1 Short click T: change the digit. 2.2 Long press T: move to next digit. Input Password 0415 3. If the password is correct,the LED will display ISP or UPDAtE
1. Click Select Scale at root menu. Then select a scale to connect 2. Back to menu, and make sure that None has changed to acaia scale. 3. To make sure you have connect the right scale, put something on the scale so that the weight shall be changing on the APP.
1. Click Select Scale at root menu. 2. The firmware update process will begin 3. When the upgrade process is done, the scale will turn off automatically.
1. Do NOT plug in USB cable during the Firmware Update. Which will cause the scale to shutdown. 2. Make sure you have connected the right scale. The best way to do so is to turn on only one scale. 3. If for any reason (including out of battery), the acaia Scale shutdown during Firmware update, please restart the Firmware Update with the following procedure: 3.1 Press Power button for 1 second to start the scale again. There will be no display at this stage, but the left yellow LED indicator will light on. 3.2 APP return to Select Scale and reconnect to the scale. 3.3 APP restart Firmware Update procedure 4. For more information or questions please email to support@acaia.co or visit www.acaia.co.
